title: Forecast of nickel consumption worldwide 2015 to 2020
summary: This statistic presents the consumption of cyber nickel thousand from 2015 to 2020 .
In 2020 , companies detected and reported 2376 thousand IT nickel breaches .
This Consumption increased by 38 thousand in the following Year .
gold: This statistic shows a forecast of the volume of nickel consumption globally from 2015 to 2020.
By 2020 , it is predicted that nickel consumption will reach nearly 2.4 million metric tons worldwide.
Nickel is most commonly used for making steels , nonferrous alloys , and electroplating .
